previous.excerpt: Teams use Ditto to manage and componentize the words across their product from design to production. ⚡ Eliminate error-prone copying and pasting and let developers get back to building. Use our API/CLI to pull up-to-date copy into local directories.
previous.title: Ditto for Developers - Sync the latest copy edits from design to development

localize.description: 团队使用Ditto来管理和组件化整个产品从设计到生产的单词。⚡消除容易出错的复制和粘贴，让开发人员回到开发中去。使用我们的API/CLI将最新的副本拉到本地目录中。
localize.tagline: 从设计到开发同步最新的文案编辑。

localize.description: 團隊使用Ditto來管理和組件化整個產品從設計到生產的單詞。⚡消除容易出錯的複製和粘貼，讓開發人員回到開發中去。使用我們的API/CLI將最新的副本拉到本地目錄中。
localize.tagline: 從設計到開發同步最新的文案編輯。

next.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 55 days in a row, down 70% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/w4TcwPL868

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已连续55天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了70%。🙏 https://t.co/w4TcwPL868。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已連續55天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了70%。🙏 https://t.co/w4TcwPL868。
